title: Lesson 05 - One Minute Japanese (repost)
description: In lesson 5 of One Minute Japanese you will learn to say that you're learning Japanese. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Japanese at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com. One Minute Japanese is brought to you by the Radio Lingua Network and is ©Copyright 2008.
